text: Kathrine McPhee and record executive David Foster were spotted on another date last night — leaving a “ romantic ” dinner at Craig ’ s restaurant in West Hollywood, Calif. After several PDA - filled public outings, a source close to the 67 - year - old music mogul told RadarOnline. com exclusively that the budding romance is all for show! Click through seven lovey - dovey photos to find out the truth behind why the unlikely duo is really dating!
